thread.title: Mrs Grainne Kelly
thread.title_full: PurpleTag.ie reviewed by Mrs Grainne Kelly

author: Mrs Grainne Kelly
title: Mrs Grainne Kelly
text: Ordered shoes came in two days courier phoned to say what time he would be there at shoes too big emailed purple returns label printed sent back free smaller size kept for me so i will have them soon will be a customer of purple tag congratulations and i am an x manager of royal mail
